items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Address proof is available from DIMS data (Government ID Proof issued by US Companies House).
Annual accounts details are available in the JPMorgan Chase Annual Report 2023; however, Ellipro Survey data is missing.
Bank account and postal details are available in DIMS.
Headquarters address is verified from GLEIF data.
Jurisdiction is confirmed as GB from GLEIF data.
Regulatory compliance data is not found in available documents.
Business scope details are provided in the JPMorgan Chase Annual Report 2023.
PEP screening data is not found in available documents.
Revenue details are available in the JPMorgan Chase Annual Report 2023.
Market capitalization details are available in the JPMorgan Chase Annual Report 2023.
